name: Keep The Distance
description:
CONTROLS

Turn Left - A

Turn Right - D

Foward - W

Fire - J

In Keep Distance, players will have to hone their skills to strategize the best way to wipe out the oncoming wave of enemies. These waves come in twenty-second bursts if you fail to wipe out the oncoming wave prepare to be swarmed by another. Utilize your arsenal of weapons to help you keep the distance.
